message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $12000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10500. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but $10500 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is already a compromise for me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $10200. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.

I understand you're trying to get the best price, but I'm not willing to go above $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $10200, so I'll make a counteroffer of $9850. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you at $9850. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm not giving away too much value. I'm counteroffering at $10500, but I'll throw in a small bonus to sweeten the deal. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $9500. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $12000.
